plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.citations
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: List of citations.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.Daisy
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Allow content to be included from a Daisy CMS repository.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.doac
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Render Description-Of-A-Career (DOAC) data in forrest content objects.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.doap
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Embed DOAP files in forrest content objects.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.foaf
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Embed FOAF files in forrest content objects.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.glossary
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Enable glossary: a list of technical terms and definitions.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.logs
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Embed log file output in Forrest sites. If Forrest is running in a dynamic environment, then pages can be updated to show recent changes in the log whenever required.

plugin.name: uk.ac.osswatch.forrest.input.ohloh
plugin.author: OSS Watch
plugin.description: Extracts data from OhLoh.net using their API

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.odt
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Use OpenDocument Writer files (*.odt) as input sources.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.Resume
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Basic support for Resumes, renders a single resume, or alloes sorting of a number of resumes on skill.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.serverStatus
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Provides a list of the Cocoon cache and other server status information.

plugin.name: uk.ac.osswatch.forrest.input.sourceforge
plugin.author: OSS Watch
plugin.description: Extracts data from sourceforge.net.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.skos
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Rendering SKOS, a set of specifications to support the representation of thesauri, classification schemes, taxonomies, etc.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.baetle
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Rendering Baetle, the RDF vocabulary to describe the content of bug databases.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.tei
plugin.author: Apache Forrest
plugin.description: Import TEI Lite documents into Forrest content objects.

plugin.name: uk.ac.osswatch.forrest.input.features
plugin.author: OSS Watch
plugin.description: Allow project features to be recorded and rendered as part of a content object. This plugin is particularly useful when used in conjunction with the DOAP plugin.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.XDoc
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Input plugin for XDoc

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.output.Anakia
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Produce output in Anakia "xdoc" format.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.output.Chart
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Charting plugin that utilises JChart.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.ecs
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Process responses from Amaozons E-Commerce System web services.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.output.htmlArea
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: WYSIWYG editing of HTML documents (requires Forrest to be running dynamically).

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.output.voice
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Add voiceXML content to a Forrest page. This allows the page to be read by a voice synthesiser and navigated with voice commands.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.output.solr
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Generates solr documents from xdos. Further when run with the dispatcher it provides a GUI to manage your project in solr and a search interface to search your solr server.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.output.tei
plugin.author: Apache Forrest
plugin.description: Create TEI Lite documents from Forrest content objects.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.themes.core
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: The core theme package for the dispatcher.

plugin.name: uk.ac.osswatch.forrest.themes
plugin.author: OSS Watch
plugin.description: A theme used by the Simal project.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.internal.IMSManifest
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Use an IMS Manifest file to manage site structure. Generates site.xml and tabs.xml from an imsmanifest.xml file when one is available. Also enables content in one Content Package to be embedded in another.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.internal.NoteTaking
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Provides facilities for adding notes to pages when Forrest is run in dynamic mode.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.internal.dispatcher
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Enable Forrest to use page-specific views and contracts. Next generation skinning.

plugin.name: org.apache.forrest.plugin.internal.xhtml2
plugin.author: Apache Forrest Project
plugin.description: Forrest versions prior to 0.9 used XDoc as their internal format, versions from 0.9 onwards are going to use a subset of XHTML2 instead. This plugin converts the main forrest sitemaps to work with XHTML2.
